subject: Re: File from tonight
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Have ya tried EVPmaker? It is based on that random principle, and 
predates the boxes.

 I've heard this stuff before, about random being the best, and I 
have to disaggree. I also think it unwise to spend every waking 
moment doing sessions. I think it creates that expectation, and 
perhaps desperation to make contact, and I would tend not to trust 
what comes through. 

 I don't trust some of this stuff because I have yet get any 
meaningful assistence with the boxes from the so called technicians. 
All I ever got was a telepathic "suggestion" to use the echo boxes. 
Everything else was a assemblage of stuff I had worked on in hte past 
to solve the problem of "what else could I use". 

 I hate to see yet another go down the road of "this is the onlyest 
way". 

 Frank-S
